## TextTechniqueParams.backgroundColor property

Text background color in hexadecimal or CSS-style notation, for example: `"#e4e9ec"`<!-- -->, `"#fff"`<!-- -->, `"rgb(255, 0, 0)"`<!-- -->, or `"hsl(35, 11%, 88%)"`<!-- -->.  color-hex

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
backgroundColor?: DynamicProperty<StyleColor>;
```
